definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: The acids in tomato juice can degrade the drink’s other ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 番茄汁中的酸會削弱其他材料帶來的味覺。

sentences.english: That’s because the friction of the wheels and track slowly drain energy away from the train.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲輪子與軌道的摩擦力會逐漸削弱車體的能量。

sentences.english: The impact impaired the power of the imperialistic country.
sentences.chinese: 這種衝擊削弱了這個帝國主義國家的實力。

sentences.english: Oil-based lubricants can weaken latex condoms and cause them to break.
sentences.chinese: 油基潤滑劑會削弱橡膠安全套並引起破裂。

sentences.english: The decision could reduce the market for counterfeit and pirated products in China.
sentences.chinese: 這一裁決有可能削弱中國的假冒產品和盜版產品市場。

sentences.english: This provision does not limit or impair any right of subrogation arising from any other relationship.
sentences.chinese: 本規定並不限制或者削弱任何基於其他關係的代位權。

sentences.english: But in the past decade it has weakened under the successive administrations of Kim Dae-jung and Roh Moo-hyun.
sentences.chinese: 但在過去十年，在金大中和盧武鉉政府下遭到削弱。

sentences.english: The complexity of a jerry-rigged firewall will undermine its effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 一個偷工減料的防火牆，其複雜性將削弱其效力。

sentences.english: The cost of climate protection would barely make a dent in that growth.
sentences.chinese: 氣候保護的代價只會略微削弱收入的增長。

sentences.english: That can jeopardize organizational reputations and undermine the credibility of their information.
sentences.chinese: 那就有可能會損害組織的聲譽並削弱信息的可信度。

sentences.english: It also tends to weaken the currency and increase inflation.
sentences.chinese: 它削弱了貨幣流通並提高了通脹。

sentences.english: We diminish ourselves and that's when we become ill.
sentences.chinese: 我們削弱自身力量，因此纔會生病。

sentences.english: The software giant dents what could have been mobile domination by Google.
sentences.chinese: 該軟件巨頭得以削弱谷歌在移動應用領域的統治地位。

sentences.english: Yet there are signs the belief in US invincibility is waning.
sentences.chinese: 但有跡象顯示，“美國無敵”的信念正在不斷削弱。

sentences.english: The stagnant global economy will dent China's export growth for years to come.
sentences.chinese: 停滯不前的全球經濟將削弱中國未來幾年的出口增長。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
